Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed near Thorndale
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing near Thorndale due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing near Thorndale due to a mechanical problem on a train. 

 Shuttle buses are available between Howard and Bryn Mawr to provide connecting service.

 At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Damen
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Damen due to fire department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Damen due to fire department activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
